body: is there any reason why you need to create this vector? it seems that it's exactly the same as `tensors` (if you really need to keep it do this instead: `tensor_list ptrs(tensors.begin(), tensors.end());`
body_html: is there any reason why you need to create this vector? it seems that it's exactly the same as tensors (if you really need to keep it do this instead: tensor_list ptrs(tensors.begin(), tensors.end());
body_text: is there any reason why you need to create this vector? it seems that it's exactly the same as tensors (if you really need to keep it do this instead: tensor_list ptrs(tensors.begin(), tensors.end());
